Home.responsibility-description: Currently a Computer Science student, I decided to pursue my career as a Full Stack developer with a focus on developing robust and elegant applications with the best practices and technologies on the market.
Home.about-description: Full Stack Developer with experience in developing robust and scalable web applications. Currently, I'm focused on developing web applications with Next.js, React.js, Node.js, Laravel, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Tailwind.
Home.proj_food: Food delivery system that allows users to place orders at any restaurant available in the app.
Home.proj_barbershop: Barbershop scheduling system that allows users to schedule an appointment with their favorite barber.
Home.proj_find_book: Find books according to the user's tastes using artificial intelligence.
Home.proj_expensive_tracker: Expense tracker that allows users to track their daily expenses.
Home.proj_burger: Burger site with shopping cart and order completion on WhatsApp.
Home.proj_pokedex: Pokedex that allows users to search and view information about pokemons.
Home.environment_variable_error: Error in the environment variables for sending emails via form. Contact your site administrator to fix.
